page.title: 08AGRICULTURE 1 DOWNDERRY
page.content: Agriculture is the major industry of the region.There are 20 individual farms included each having a distinct and individual management policy.A sample is given by outlining the practice on three farms. (1)KEVERAL 33 rented acres.Organic methods without artificial fertilizer enables strawberries,peas, parsnips, potatoes,cucumbers and sweetcorn,to be produced on 5 acres.Hardwood coppice management of 7 acres provides small wood and fuel for heating and cooking. Grass on 5 acres for 2 horses,3 cows + hens.The 14 acres of scrub are being planted with native hardwoods (8000 whips planted in 1985) Fossil fuels are used very sparingly,in line with the philosophy of the{commune}"To help to develop a way of life which exploits neither people nor cultures nor the earth on which we all depend."
